channel.title: 2022 on lecta collecta

item.title: Excerpts from 2022 reading
item.description: Take me to the first quote from: Shutdown by Adam Tooze, The Ascent of Money: A Financial History of the World by Niall Ferguson, The Wages of Destruction: The Making and Breaking of the Nazi Economy by Tooze, Adam, The Great Divergence by Pomeranz, Kenneth, Sweetness and Power by Sidney W. Mintz, The Belly of Paris by Emile Zola, Germinal by Émile Zola, Norwegian Wood by Haruki Murakami, Pandora’s Box by Jörn Leonhard,
